Personal Protective Equipment

How do you correctly put on personal protective equipment in a hospital? This infographic, created for the Minneapolis Health Department, explains the correct order and includes some dos and don’ts when donning PPE.

Public Health Design

Background

Resilience Continuum is a project by Claire Nyquist which explores science through data visualization, fiction, and graphic design.
